Report on File System Disk Usage

Source: R/disk_free.R
disk_free.Rd

Report on File System Disk Usage

disk_free(mounts = NULL, local = FALSE)

Arguments

mounts

A character vector of disks (mount points) to query. If NULL, all disks are queried.
local

If TRUE, only local disks are queried.

Value

A data.frame (tibble) where each row corresponds to a unique disk.

Details

This function queries df -P (POSIX output format) on the system.

Examples

## All disks
df <- disk_free()
#> Warning: The following named parsers don't match the column names: Mounted on
#> Warning: 49 parsing failures.
#> row col  expected    actual         file
#>   1  -- 7 columns 6 columns <connection>
#>   2  -- 7 columns 6 columns <connection>
#>   3  -- 7 columns 6 columns <connection>
#>   4  -- 7 columns 6 columns <connection>
#>   5  -- 7 columns 6 columns <connection>
#> ... ... ......... ......... ............
#> See problems(...) for more details.
print(df)
#> # A tibble: 49 × 7
#>    filesystem     blocks_1024      used available capacity mounted         on   
#>    <chr>                <dbl>     <dbl>     <dbl>    <dbl> <chr>           <chr>
#>  1 udev               8044064         0   8044064     0    /dev            NA   
#>  2 tmpfs              1613836      2364   1611472     0.01 /run            NA   
#>  3 /dev/nvme0n1p5   755812992 686335752  31014316     0.96 /               NA   
#>  4 tmpfs              8069164     84344   7984820     0.02 /dev/shm        NA   
#>  5 tmpfs                 5120         4      5116     0.01 /run/lock       NA   
#>  6 tmpfs              8069164         0   8069164     0    /sys/fs/cgroup  NA   
#>  7 /dev/loop2             640       640         0     1    /snap/gnome-lo… NA   
#>  8 /dev/loop3          144128    144128         0     1    /snap/gnome-3-… NA   
#>  9 /dev/loop4           38528     38528         0     1    /snap/tiv/1     NA   
#> 10 /dev/loop5            8832      8832         0     1    /snap/auto-cpu… NA   
#> # … with 39 more rows

## All local disks
df <- disk_free(local = TRUE)
#> Warning: The following named parsers don't match the column names: Mounted on
#> Warning: 49 parsing failures.
#> row col  expected    actual         file
#>   1  -- 7 columns 6 columns <connection>
#>   2  -- 7 columns 6 columns <connection>
#>   3  -- 7 columns 6 columns <connection>
#>   4  -- 7 columns 6 columns <connection>
#>   5  -- 7 columns 6 columns <connection>
#> ... ... ......... ......... ............
#> See problems(...) for more details.
print(df)
#> # A tibble: 49 × 7
#>    filesystem     blocks_1024      used available capacity mounted         on   
#>    <chr>                <dbl>     <dbl>     <dbl>    <dbl> <chr>           <chr>
#>  1 udev               8044064         0   8044064     0    /dev            NA   
#>  2 tmpfs              1613836      2364   1611472     0.01 /run            NA   
#>  3 /dev/nvme0n1p5   755812992 686335752  31014316     0.96 /               NA   
#>  4 tmpfs              8069164     84344   7984820     0.02 /dev/shm        NA   
#>  5 tmpfs                 5120         4      5116     0.01 /run/lock       NA   
#>  6 tmpfs              8069164         0   8069164     0    /sys/fs/cgroup  NA   
#>  7 /dev/loop2             640       640         0     1    /snap/gnome-lo… NA   
#>  8 /dev/loop3          144128    144128         0     1    /snap/gnome-3-… NA   
#>  9 /dev/loop4           38528     38528         0     1    /snap/tiv/1     NA   
#> 10 /dev/loop5            8832      8832         0     1    /snap/auto-cpu… NA   
#> # … with 39 more rows

## /tmp 
df <- disk_free(c("/tmp"))
#> Warning: The following named parsers don't match the column names: Mounted on
#> Warning: 1 parsing failure.
#> row col  expected    actual         file
#>   1  -- 7 columns 6 columns <connection>
print(df)
#> # A tibble: 1 × 7
#>   filesystem     blocks_1024      used available capacity mounted on   
#>   <chr>                <dbl>     <dbl>     <dbl>    <dbl> <chr>   <chr>
#> 1 /dev/nvme0n1p5   755812992 686335756  31014312     0.96 /       NA
